com.smartnsoft.droid4me.framework
Interface Commands.Executable<BusinessObjectClass>

Type Parameters:
BusinessObjectClass - the business object class the command deals with
All Known Implementing Classes:
Commands.EnabledExecutable, Commands.StaticEnabledExecutable, Commands.StaticExecutable, Commands.StaticVisibleExecutable, Commands.VisibleExecutable
Enclosing interface:
Commands
public static interface Commands.Executable<BusinessObjectClass>

The interface that makes possible to run a command on a business object.

The Executable#isVisible(BusinessObjectClass) and Executable#isEnabled(BusinessObjectClass) methods will be invoked dynamically every time the end-user makes the menu appear.

Method Summary
 boolean isEnabled(BusinessObjectClass businessObject)
          The method which will be invoked to determine whether the command should be enabled, i.e. grayed or not.
 boolean isVisible(BusinessObjectClass businessObject)
          The method which will be invoked to determine whether the command should be visible, i.e. displayed.
 void run(BusinessObjectClass businessObject)
          The method which will be invoked when the command is executed.
 

Method Detail

run

void run(BusinessObjectClass businessObject)
The method which will be invoked when the command is executed.

Parameters:
businessObject - the business object the command is executed against

isVisible

boolean isVisible(BusinessObjectClass businessObject)
The method which will be invoked to determine whether the command should be visible, i.e. displayed.

Parameters:
businessObject - the business object the command is executed against
Returns:
true if and only if the command should be visible

isEnabled

boolean isEnabled(BusinessObjectClass businessObject)
The method which will be invoked to determine whether the command should be enabled, i.e. grayed or not. The method will only be invoked provided the #isVisible(BusinessObjectClass) has previously returned true.

Parameters:
businessObject - the business object the command is executed against
Returns:
true if and only if the command should be enabled ; if false, the entry will be grayed, but will be visible
